name: Blue Elegance
description: A sophisticated blue-centric theme for iTerm2 & Powerlevel10k based on the palette #7d9aae, #d5ac3b, #e1e6eb, #5f7585.
author: Generated for zsh_setting project
inspiration: Calm morning sky and warm sunlight accents, delivering clarity and focus.

design_philosophy.approach: Combine cool blues for calm reading surface with a single warm gold highlight for interactive elements.

usage.background: Deep blue (#5f7585) lowers eye strain during long sessions.
usage.primary_text: Light silver (#e1e6eb) provides high contrast on dark background.
usage.directory_display: Medium blue background with silver text for clear navigation.
usage.git_indicators: Gold accent highlights repository state without overwhelming.
usage.prompt_feedback: Gold success/error cues stand out instantly against blue canvas.
